top_repos.name: writer-framework
top_repos.description: No-code in the front, Python in the back. An open-source framework for creating data apps.

top_repos.name: cookbooks
top_repos.description: This repository contains a collection of Jupyter notebooks demonstrating how to use the Writer Python SDK for various AI-related tasks. These notebooks provide practical examples and tutorials for working with our models and services, including model retrieval, text and chat completion, knowledge graph manipulation, and more.
